      • createBlockMatrix

        public Matrix createBlockMatrix(Matrix a,
                       Matrix b,
                       Matrix c,
                       Matrix d)
        Deprecated. 
        Description copied from class: Factory
        Creates a matrix from given blocks. Throws IllegalArgumentException if sizes of blocks are incompatible.

        See http://mathworld.wolfram.com/BlockMatrix.html for more details.

        Specified by:
        createBlockMatrix in class Factory
        Parameters:
        a - the first block
        b - the second block
        c - the third block
        d - the forth block
        Returns:
        a block matrix
